rows.label: tlk45310341_03_msg0001
rows.name:
You're starting to get the look of
a veteran mercenary about you.

rows.label: tlk45310341_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Hahah, I'm just kidding.
You're not that rugged yet.

rows.label: tlk45310341_03_msg0003
rows.name:
But you are doing a fine job of
leading the Hræsvelgr Mercenaries.
Vandham would be proud.

rows.label: tlk45310341_03_msg0004
rows.name:
The bigger our mercenary band
gets, the more Blades you can
manage at once.

rows.label: tlk45310341_03_msg0005
rows.name:
'Course, you can still only take three
per Driver around with you at a time,
but it's good to have plenty in reserve!

rows.label: tlk45310341_03_msg0006
rows.name:
So if I were you, I'd try to build
the Hræsvelgr Mercenaries up to be
as big as you can.

rows.label: tlk45310341_03_msg0007
rows.name:
As big as old Vandham's body, even!
Hahahah!
